title: LF a team to play with
body: So I use to be gold 1(about to be gold 5 again) a few months ago and took a 6 month Hiatus. I have mained all lanes at one time or another and can play them all decently. I would make a great sub or can play whatever Role you your team needs as I can always adjust. I am in EST and can play most nights and weekends so let me know give it a chance High ELO or not and you might be surprised of what I can offer.

replies.body: excellent! im at work atm so ill send you a invite and we can play a game or 2. also if your free sundays and thrusdays thats gonna be really awsome
im actually looking for a sub support. were currently in a tournament atm so if you are adaptable i would love to have you

> [{quoted}](name=GraveySpartan,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=lsgyp7vE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-06T16:44:15.036+0000)
>
> im actually looking for a sub support. were currently in a tournament atm so if you are adaptable i would love to have you

Very Adaptable I play Braum, Ali, Thresh, Morg, or Sona Support ATM. So if you guys need a sub let me know and lets play a game sometime.
